description: In the world of "Earth Defense Force: Iron Rain," the Kindred Rebellion ceded from the EDF and developed their own experimental Prowl Rider PA-Gear. While the EDF's Prowl Rider technology took the lead and the Rebellion's version of the gear came to be known as a "prototype," its specs are comparable to the EDF's official gear. This allows you to use the Kindred Rebellion's version of the Prowl Rider, equipped with a special weapon. Now, go and prove that the Rebellion's technology is a force to be reckoned with.
name: Prowl Rider (EDF: IR), KR Prototype & Special Gear
